name: Osaurus Browser
description: Headless browser automation using WebKit WebView

tools.name: browser_navigate
tools.description: Navigate to a URL and wait for the page to load

tools.name: browser_get_content
tools.description: Get the text content of the page or a specific element

tools.name: browser_get_html
tools.description: Get the HTML of the page or a specific element

tools.name: browser_execute_script
tools.description: Execute JavaScript in the current page

tools.name: browser_click
tools.description: Click an element on the page

tools.name: browser_type
tools.description: Type text into an input element

tools.name: browser_select
tools.description: Select an option from a dropdown

tools.name: browser_screenshot
tools.description: Take a screenshot of the current page

tools.name: browser_wait
tools.description: Wait for an element to appear
